import axios from 'axios' import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import Admin from './Admin' import User from './User' const Home = () => { const[role,setRole]=useState('') const navigate=useNavigate(); axios.defaults.withCredentials=true; useEffect(()=>{ axios.get('http://localhost:8081') .then(res =>{ if(res.data.valid){ setRole(res.data.role) }else{ navigate('/login') } }) .catch(err=>console.log(err)) },[]) return (
